name: The Lost Sheepies
description:
A three day gamejam on the theme "Christian Computer Games". This was built by Daniel (16) using Construct 2. It features a Shepherd looking for his lost sheep.

WSAD to move (touch controls for phone is available but not tested)

http://codethegame.blogspot.com/2018/08/game-jam-2018-day-1.html
